mapper.select: select r.relation_id relationId,r.user_id userId,r.goodfrient_id goodFrientId,u.user_name userName from relation r left JOIN `user` u on r.goodfrient_id=u.user_id where r.relation_id = (SELECT MIN(BB.relation_id) FROM relation BB WHERE r.user_id = BB.user_id and r.goodfrient_id= BB.goodfrient_id GROUP BY BB.user_id) and r.user_id=#{id}

select h.home_name homeName,h.home_id homeId,h.home_address homeAddress,h.home_price homePrice,p.picture_one pictureOne from collection c LEFT JOIN home h on h.home_id=c.home_id left join pictures p on p.picture_id=h.pictures_id where c.user_id=#{id} and c.collection_id = (SELECT MIN(BB.collection_id) FROM collection BB WHERE c.user_id = BB.user_id and c.home_id= BB.home_id GROUP BY BB.user_id) ORDER BY c.collection_id
